channel.title: Recent Executive Orders
channel.description: Latest Executive Orders from the White House

item.title: Leading The World in Supersonic Flight
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.

item.title: Restoring American Airspace Sovereignty
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.

item.title: Unleashing American Drone Dominance
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.

item.title: Sustaining Select Efforts to Strengthen the Nation’s Cybersecurity and Amending Executive Order 13694 and Executive Order 14144
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the International Emergency

item.title: Deploying Advanced Nuclear Reactor Technologies for National Security
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered:Section 1. Background.

item.title: Ordering the Reform of the Nuclear Regulatory Commission
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered:Section 1. Purpose.

item.title: Reforming Nuclear Reactor Testing at the Department of Energy
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered:Section 1. Purpose.

item.title: Reinvigorating the Nuclear Industrial Base
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1.

item.title: Restoring Gold Standard Science
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including section 7301 of title 5, United

item.title: Modifying Reciprocal Tariff Rates to Reflect Discussions with the People’s Republic of China
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the International Emergency
